summary: Build an app for selling kids worksheets as digital products, including adding a large product catalog (11,000+ worksheets).
architectural_notes: Worksheets products should be modeled/sold as digital/downloadable products (not physical/shippable).
known_issues: Deployment process failed with a deployment error (unable to complete deployment).

existing_features.title: Add a new default product category for kids worksheets (e.g., id: "kids-worksheets", name: "Kids Worksheets") that can be created by an admin from the Admin page and/or seeded via the existing demo seeder.
Add at least one kids-worksheets product to the catalog (a single sample/bundle product, not 11,000+) so the storefront has a real worksheet product visible after seeding or manual admin creation.

Update the Admin UI product form to support creating/updating a product as a digital product and uploading an associated downloadable file (in addition to the existing product image upload). Use English for all user-facing text.

Add a customer downloads flow: (1) ensure the checkout success URL includes enough context (e.g., productId(s) and/or session id) to confirm entitlements, (2) on the Payment Success page, confirm the purchase and show a working list of downloadable items for the logged-in user, and (3) make the existing “View Downloads” button navigate to a dedicated downloads page that lists entitled digital products and provides download links.

Update the global styling/theme to use an attractive light-color design (light backgrounds, soft accents, readable contrast) instead of the current vibrant magenta/purple-heavy look, by adjusting the Tailwind/CSS theme tokens and utility classes so the new palette applies consistently across the app.

Apply the updated light-color theme consistently across key storefront pages and shared layout components by replacing or reworking existing vibrant/gradient styling usages (e.g., vibrant color classes, gradient headings/backgrounds, and button treatments) so the UI feels cohesive and polished on Home, Shop, Product Detail, About, Contact, Downloads, and payment result pages.

Update the global light-theme background color to a light pink by changing the CSS theme token used by Tailwind’s `bg-background` (the `--background` variable in `frontend/src/index.css` under `:root`).
Create a more premium, eye-catching brand logo and update the site to use it in the header and footer brand area.
Add standard favicon/app icon assets derived from the new logo and wire them into the HTML head so the browser tab icon updates.

Polish the storefront UI to feel more premium by replacing remaining “vibrant/gradient” styling treatments (e.g., vibrant-button, gradient-vibrant-bg, hover:shadow-vibrant, strong background gradients) with a more refined, consistent premium look across the main customer-facing pages (Home, Shop, Product Detail) and the shared Header/Footer.
Ensure all newly generated branding images are shipped as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and are loaded directly by the frontend (no backend image routing).
Add a new product priced at INR ₹199.00 (19900 paise) to the product catalog so it is visible in the Shop and Product Detail pages after demo seeding.
Update Demo Data Setup UI text to accurately reflect the new total number of demo products and the INR price range after adding the ₹199 product.

Make the "Add New Product" flow fully functional end-to-end so an admin can add a product from the Admin page and the newly created product reliably appears in the "Existing Products" list and is visible in the Shop page and Product Detail page without requiring a manual refresh or reseeding.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add products to the app (kids worksheets catalog; user mentioned 11,000+ worksheets as products)
Support adding kids worksheets as digital products (downloadable items)

Extend the Product model to support digital products by adding optional digital-download metadata and an optional downloadable file reference, while keeping existing product behavior unchanged for non-digital products.
Add backend APIs to let an admin attach/update/remove a product's digital download file (stored using existing blob storage) without affecting the product image list.

Add backend purchase entitlement tracking for digital products and expose user-only APIs to (1) record/confirm a successful payment for specific productId(s) and (2) list the caller’s entitled digital downloads.
Update storefront/admin UI styling to use an attractive light-color theme (improve overall look and feel)
Adjust the app’s global background color to a light pink (as part of the updated light-color theme)
Make the website feel more premium and add an eye-catching logo (branding update)
Add a (kids worksheets) product priced at INR 199/- to the product catalog

projectName: Add Kids Worksheets products to the store catalog
